level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary repeal of section, see § 802 (a) of the Omnibus Criminal Justice Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 1994 (D.C. Act 10-255, June 22, 1994, 41 DCR 4286).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-151, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 24-221.01.
